name: Gerald J. CROWLEY, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent

parties: Gerald J. CROWLEY, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 7th day of December, 1994, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is Granted. Pursuant to Commonwealth, Dept. of Transportation v. Ingram, and Commonwealth, Dept. of Transportation v. Frain, 538 Pa. 236, 648 A.2d 285 (1994), the Order of Commonwealth Court is hereby Affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
655 A.2d 491
Gerald J. CROWLEY, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 7, 1994.
